reviews.review_msg: ann is a great prof...as a guy i didnt find it difficult to obtain a good grade...definately would recommend her, very passionate about her subject

class attendance required as the participation marks would be helpful to boost assignment marks. assignments are extremely hard. you get 13 weeks to complete 5 discussions and 5 responses. you do not have to hand in the week your assigned. It would be best to complete you 5 responses in first 5 weeks first, and leave discussions to last. =)

Otero is a solid prof- he IS old school and expects you to work really hard and spend 12 hrs/wk reading. He's a warm person and is super helpful if you ask, so ask! He has to be tough because it's a req'd course, and if you're lazy or a poor communicator then your grade will reflect that, but he'll tell you how to fix it for next the paper.
